history.heading: Linear Variable Differential Transformer (LVDT) systems having all of the following:
history.title: Linear Variable Differential Transformer (LVDT) systems having all of the following:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774 - The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: B. “Test”, “Inspection” and “Production Equipment”
2B006 Dimensional inspection or measuring systems, equipment, and “electronic assemblies”, as follows (see List of Items Controlled).
Linear and angular displacement measuring instruments, as follows:
‘Linear displacement’ measuring instruments having any of the following:
history.text:
Linear Variable Differential Transformer (LVDT) systems having all of the following:
“”Having any of the following:
b.1.b.1. “”Having any of the following:
“Linearity” equal to or less (better) than 0.1% measured from 0 to the 'full operating range', for LVDTs with a 'full operating range' up to and including ±5 mm; or
b.1.b.1.a. “Linearity” equal to or less (better) than 0.1% measured from 0 to the 'full operating range', for LVDTs with a 'full operating range' up to and including ±5 mm; or
“Linearity” equal to or less (better) than 0.1% measured from 0 to 5 mm for LVDTs with a 'full operating range' greater than ±5 mm; and
b.1.b.1.b. “Linearity” equal to or less (better) than 0.1% measured from 0 to 5 mm for LVDTs with a 'full operating range' greater than ±5 mm; and
Drift equal to or less (better) than 0.1% per day at a standard ambient test room temperature ±1 K;
b.1.b.2. Drift equal to or less (better) than 0.1% per day at a standard ambient test room temperature ±1 K;
Technical Note: For the purposes of 2B006.b.1.b, 'full operating range' is half of the total possible linear displacement of the LVDT. For example, LVDTs with a 'full operating range' up to and including ±5 mm can measure a total possible linear displacement of 10 mm.

children.heading: Drift equal to or less (better) than 0.1% per day at a standard ambient test room temperature ±1 K;

content.html: b.1.b.2. Drift equal to or less (better) than 0.1% per day at a standard ambient test room temperature ±1 K;
content.text: b.1.b.2. Drift equal to or less (better) than 0.1% per day at a standard ambient test room temperature ±1 K;

content.html:
Technical Note:

For the purposes of 2B006.b.1.b, 'full operating range' is half of the total possible linear displacement of the LVDT. For example, LVDTs with a 'full operating range' up to and including ±5 mm can measure a total possible linear displacement of 10 mm.
